content.description:
Climb this moderate with 1.5X set of nuts and 1x cams from #0.4 to #2.

This has good climbing and is a warm-up for this crag.
content.location: Once you have located this crag, walk climber's left. Find the leftmost ledge, and locate the crack that starts on this ledge.

climbs.name: Pop Top
climbs.fa: M. Baker, B. Perlmutter, G. Parker, D. Molnar, 1993

content.description: Climb this mixed route which trends right on a seam and above a overhang.
content.location:
This is around a dihedral to the climber's right of

This Ain't Kansas

.

content.description:
Start in a shallow corner feature with a hard start and an awkward corner, moving right at the top to avoid the chimney. Expect some crumbly and dirty rock as this route doesn't seem to be climbed much. Finish on the slab and the shared anchor with

Jack Flash

.
content.protection: 6 or 7 bolts plus a 2 bolt anchor. The number depends if you skip a bolt on the slab or clip both of the slab bolts.
content.location:
On the far right side of the crag, start in a corner feature. It's just left of

Jack Flash

and shares the same anchor.

content.description:
Climb horizontals to a scoop feature, then make a mantel move to gain the friction slab. A couple bolts protect the final slab. The anchor is on a face above the slab.

It's possible to scramble (4th Class) around the right side to get to the anchor and set a toprope.
content.location: On the far right of the crag, starting behind an aspen tree, look for the horizontals and scoop feature. The finishing slab is not visible from below.

content.description:
Start on the right side of the overhang which

Pop Top

climbs above.
content.protection: Stoppers and small nuts plus a couple of quickdraws.
content.location: Climb right of the overhang and into a black dihedral to the top.

climbs.name: Clip or Whip
climbs.fa: D. Mulnar, M. Baker, Z. Merrit, 1993

content.description: Clip or Whip is a full on sport route to the top.
content.location: This is the first route you will come to when you reach the cliff.
